forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain showers early becoming steadier for the afternoon. High 14C. S winds at 40 to 55 km/h, decreasing to 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain showers early becoming steadier for the afternoon. High 57F. S winds at 25 to 35 mph, decreasing to 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with showers and thunderstorms likely. Low 9C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers along with a few thunderstorms. Low 47F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain with thunderstorms by evening. High around 10C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Thunderstorms possible...mainly in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers with a possible thunderstorm in the evening, then variable clouds overnight with still a chance of showers. Low around 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm during the evening, then some lingering showers still possible overnight. Low around 40F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early then thundershowers developing later in the day. High 9C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early then thundershowers developing later in the day. High 48F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 34F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 48F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low near 0C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 32F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High around 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 37F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High 11C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High 51F. SE winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low around 35F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 38F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 11C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 3C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 37F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 52F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 3C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 38F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 52F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.
